template.title: TimeSeries
template.html:
<svg id="doc1" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0" y="0"  viewBox="-10, 0, 510, 250">
  <g id="Layer_1">


    {{#with  json_parse values}}
           <polyline fill="none" stroke="orange" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2"  
           points ="
        {{#each indexedArray this}}
            {{step index length}},{{revvalue}}
        
        {{/each}}
        "  />
        {{#each indexedArray this}}
           {{#if minval}}
           <circle cx="{{step index length}}" cy="{{revvalue}}" r="5" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="red" />
           {{/if}}
         {{#if maxval}}
           <circle cx="{{step index length}}" cy="{{revvalue}}" r="5" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="green" />
           {{/if}}
        {{/each}}

         <circle cx="140" cy="12" r="5" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="green" />
         <circle cx="220" cy="12" r="5" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="red" />
         <text text-anchor="left"
          x="20" y="20" style="font-size: 20px;" stroke="orange"  fill="ORANGE">curr: {{currentval}}</text>
          <text text-anchor="left"
          x="150" y="20" style="font-size: 20px;" stroke="green"  fill="ORANGE">{{max}}</text>
          <text text-anchor="left"
          x="230" y="20" style="font-size: 20px;" stroke="red"  fill="ORANGE">{{min}}</text>
  <text text-anchor="left"
          x="0" y="230" style="font-size: 20px;" stroke="orange"  fill="orange">{{legend}}</text>
          <text text-anchor="left"
          x="350" y="230" style="font-size: 20px;" stroke="orange"  fill="green">({{autoscaling}})</text>
    {{/with}}
    
  </g>
</svg>
